document_data.caption: A provision bag.
document_data.name: Provision Bag
document_data.mainbody: '''Provision bags''' were tools sometimes used by [[ranger]]s or woodsmen throughout [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: Leather was used to make provision bags.
document_data.History:
Provision bags were used to store food items without attracting the attention of animals by sealing their smell inside of the bag.

Provision bags were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 3 [[gold piece]]s each.
